title: Robert Borosage: There Is No Going Back to Normalcy
itunes:title: Robert Borosage: There Is No Going Back to Normalcy
description: The co-founder of the Campaign for America’s Future, Robert Borosage, discusses the many potential pitfalls the Biden administration must deal with, from a new cold war with China, to the persistence of market fundamentalism.
content:encoded: The co-founder of the Campaign for America’s Future, Robert Borosage, discusses the many potential pitfalls the Biden administration must deal with, from a new cold war with China, to the persistence of market fundamentalism.
itunes:subtitle: The co-founder of the Campaign for America’s Future, Robert Borosage, discusses the many potential pitfalls the Biden administration must deal with, from a new cold war with China, to the persistence of market fundamentalism.

itunes:author: Institute for New Economic Thinking (INET)
